nodes.text: Tookreek was a male Kadas'sa'Nikto who owned and operated Tookreek's Cantina at Dreviad Outpost on Tatooine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
Tookreek worked as a lieutenant in the gang of the reclusive crime lord Diago Hixan on the desert planet of Tatooine. He also owned a cantina in Dreviad Outpost.

Sometime by the year 3643 BBY, Tookreek had agreed  to meet with a smuggler captain at his cantina. After the meeting, Tookreek agreed to take the smuggler captain to his boss Diago Hixan at the Lightspring. There, Tookreek and Hixan were ambushed by the Sith Vaverone Zare and the Jedi Nariel Pridence, leading to a half-crazed Hixan to call upon his security droids to kill everyone present, including Tookreek.
